name: Cnidarian
description: C compiled WASM with HTML UI and Docker runner #C #WASM #mhn

name: ðŸ–§ Get bplusðŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸ï¸ apps
description: grab the bplus series of apps, currently* Cnidarian, streamdlrs-gui, and searchrs(set your keys in .env) #bplus #mhn #install

name: â–¶ï¸ Launch bplus-streamdlrs-gui
description: download streaming media from... platforms end task with: taskkill /IM bplus-streamdlrs.exe, saved ending: -WindowStyle Hidden  #bplus #mhn
command: cmd /c start powershell -Command Start-Process bplus-streamdlrs-gui\bplus-streamdlrs-gui.exe -WorkingDirectory bplus-streamdlrs-gui -RedirectStandardOutput C:\Temp\bplus-streamdlrs-gui.log -RedirectStandardError C:\Temp\bplus-streamdlrs-gui.err

name: ðŸ”Ž Launch bplus-searchrs
description: LLM powered web search, built-in and connection to SearXNG end task with: taskkill /IM bplus-searchrs.exe, saved ending: -WindowStyle Hidden  #bplus #mhn
command: cmd /c start powershell -Command Start-Process bplus-searchrs\bplus-searchrs.exe -WorkingDirectory bplus-searchrs -RedirectStandardOutput C:\Temp\bplus-searchrs.log -RedirectStandardError C:\Temp\bplus-searchrs.err

name: bplus running apps
command: ps -eo pid,comm | grep bplus && echo "" && echo "Type: pkill <bplus-suffix> ex. pkill searchrs to stop bplus-searchrs"

name: ðŸ–§ Get static llama.cpp vulkan build
description: llama-server vulkan static build for linux #llama #install

name: ðŸ¦™ Run model with llama.cpp server
description: pick your hf model with -hf or local dir with -m #llama

name: ðŸ–§ Get Life Manager
description: dl lifeman app from mhn github, #install #life
command: git clone https://github.com/mrhappynice/lifeman.git && curl -L -o lifeman/lifeman https://github.com/mrhappynice/lifeman/releases/download/v0.2/lifeman && chmod +x lifeman/lifeman

name: Start Life Manager
description: run the lifeman app, end task with: taskkill /IM lifeman.exe, saved ending: -WindowStyle Hidden#life
command: cmd /c start powershell -Command Start-Process lifeman\lifeman.exe -WorkingDirectory lifeman -RedirectStandardOutput C:\Temp\lifeman.log -RedirectStandardError C:\Temp\lifeman.err
